sentences.english: Long ago, a kind girl named Sim Cheong lived with her blind father.
sentences.korean: 오래전, 심청이라는 착한 소녀가 눈먼 아버지와 함께 살았습니다.

sentences.english: Her mother died when she was born, and her father raised her alone.
sentences.korean: 그녀의 어머니는 그녀가 태어났을 때 돌아가셨고, 아버지가 혼자 키웠습니다.

sentences.english: They were very poor but loved each other deeply.
sentences.korean: 그들은 매우 가난했지만 서로를 깊이 사랑했습니다.

sentences.english: Sim Cheong's father was blind and needed rice offering to regain sight.
sentences.korean: 심청의 아버지는 눈이 멀었고 시력을 되찾기 위해 공양미가 필요했습니다.

sentences.english: A monk told him that donating 300 bags of rice would restore his sight.
sentences.korean: 한 스님이 쌀 300석을 기부하면 시력을 되찾을 것이라고 말했습니다.

sentences.english: The poor father made a promise he could not keep.
sentences.korean: 가난한 아버지는 지킬 수 없는 약속을 했습니다.

sentences.english: Sim Cheong heard about sailors who needed a young woman for a sacrifice.
sentences.korean: 심청은 제물로 바칠 젊은 여자가 필요한 뱃사람들에 대해 들었습니다.

sentences.english: She sacrificed herself to the sea god in exchange for the rice.
sentences.korean: 그녀는 쌀을 대가로 바다 신에게 자신을 희생했습니다.

sentences.english: She loved her father so much that she was willing to give her life.
sentences.korean: 그녀는 아버지를 너무 사랑해서 목숨을 바칠 각오가 되어 있었습니다.

sentences.english: The sailors took Sim Cheong to the middle of the deep sea.
sentences.korean: 뱃사람들은 심청을 깊은 바다 한가운데로 데려갔습니다.

sentences.english: She jumped into the sea and woke up in an underwater palace.
sentences.korean: 그녀는 바다로 뛰어들었고 수중 궁전에서 깨어났습니다.

sentences.english: The Dragon King ruled the underwater kingdom with wisdom.
The king was moved by her filial piety and sent her back in a lotus flower.
sentences.korean: 왕은 그녀의 효심에 감동하여 그녀를 연꽃에 태워 돌려보냈습니다.

sentences.english: The lotus flower floated on the water and was found by fishermen.
sentences.korean: 연꽃은 물 위에 떠 있었고 어부들에게 발견되었습니다.

sentences.english: The beautiful flower was brought to the king of the land.
sentences.korean: 아름다운 꽃은 그 땅의 왕에게 가져가졌습니다.

sentences.english: She became the queen and held a banquet for blind men.
sentences.korean: 그녀는 왕비가 되었고 맹인들을 위한 연회를 열었습니다.

sentences.english: She hoped her father would come to the feast to find her.
sentences.korean: 그녀는 아버지가 그녀를 찾기 위해 잔치에 올 것을 바랐습니다.

sentences.english: Her father came, opened his eyes, and saw his daughter again.
sentences.korean: 그녀의 아버지가 와서 눈을 뜨고 딸을 다시 보았습니다.
